title: Wall St. Causes Inflation? Netflix Password Police 06.06.22
itunes:title: Wall St. Causes Inflation? Netflix Password Police 06.06.22
description:
In episode 1262, Jack and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian, author, and TV writer, Emily Winter, to discuss… Reminder: Inflation Is Caused By Rich People Getting Richer, Not Poor People Getting a Couple Thousand Dollars, Netflix’s Password Sharing Crackdown is Already a Sh*tshow and more!

  1. Reminder: Inflation Is Caused By Rich People Getting Richer, Not Poor People Getting a Couple Thousand Dollars
  2. Netflix’s Password Sharing Crackdown is Already a Sh*tshow
  3. Netflix estimates 100 million households are sharing passwords and suggests a global crackdown is coming
  4. Netflix cracks down on password sharing, but early efforts in Peru are a mess

LISTEN: Sphynx Gate/The World It Softly Lulls by Hiatus Kaiyote

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
